body:
Who do you think will make it through the interviews. I personally think itzdylan115 has the highest chance to make it through.
Your thoughts?

title: Who do you think will make it through?

replies.body: I have high hopes for Ducksfanwaterloo and Merlinmaster. But I'm sure everyone will do good!
replies.body_tagged: I have high hopes for Ducksfanwaterloo and Merlinmaster. But I'm sure everyone will do good!

replies.body: I have high hopes for itzdylan115 and Mooch24  and some other people.
replies.body_tagged: I have high hopes for itzdylan115 and Mooch24  and some other people.

replies.body: Dudes i know this is just everyones opinions and i respect that however these kind of posts are cruel and result in people feeling unliked and left out. All interviewees have a good chance also i think you have worded the post wrong. It says who will make it through to the interviews well there is a list of those people somewhere but i can't seem to be able to find it for you. However i assume you meant who will make it to jr mod? So could you archive the post to avoid upsetting people? Thank you.

All interviewees have a good chance also i think you have worded the post wrong. It says who will make it through to the interviews well there is a list of those people somewhere but i can't seem to be able to find it for you. However i assume you meant who will make it to jr mod? So could you archive the post to avoid upsetting people? Thank you.

replies.body: I am hoping for everybody to make it through. :D
